Lyric:
[by:电音综合症]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:03.20]Heard you in the distance
[00:07.16]The storm on the scope
[00:11.26]Almighty thunder coming for me at home
[00:18.82]Rolled over the horizon
[00:22.90]Swept up it all
[00:26.95]Banged on the hatches and teardrops and branches
[00:31.80]But I hear the silence now
[00:35.74]Right in my core
[00:39.49]I never heard silence
[00:43.28]Like this before
[00:47.41]Yeah~I hear the silence now
[00:51.20]From wall to wall
[00:55.33]Never heard silence
[00:58.94]Like this before
[01:20.23]Very tall buildings
[01:24.17]Lights at our speed
[01:27.92]Trails on the taxis heading all around me
[01:35.85]Up on the rooftop
[01:39.50]Wasteland of a view
[01:43.61]Peace of the silence can you hear it to
[01:50.36]Or is it just silence now
[01:54.32]Cause I tell you what
[01:58.30]I never heard silence
[02:02.20]Like this before
[02:25.68]But I hear the silence now
[02:43.47]I hear the silence now
[03:00.99]I hear the silence now
[03:04.87]Right in my core
[03:08.64]I never heard silence
[03:12.72]Like this before
